entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
